query_1.text: Who was George Washington, and what roles did he play in American history?

query_2.text: What significant achievements did George Washington accomplish during his presidency?

query_3.text: When did George Washington serve as the first President of the United States, and how long was his term?

query_4.text: Where was George Washington born, and how did his upbringing influence his leadership?

query_5.text: Why is George Washington often referred to as the "Father of His Country"?

query_6.text: How did George Washington's military strategies contribute to the success of the American Revolution?
